mapper.select: SELECT userpost.sequ_number AS sequenceNumber, userpost.content AS content, userpost.write_date AS writeDate, twituser.username AS userName, twituser.photo AS photo FROM twituser, userpost WHERE twituser.userid = userpost.userid AND twituser.userid = #{userid} ORDER BY userpost.write_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM userpost WHERE userid = #{userId} AND sequ_number = #{sequenceNumber}
